guide.introduction: Make a mini BB gun out of a mechanical pencil
guide.introduction_rendered: Make a mini BB gun out of a mechanical pencil

lines.text: Remove the top and remove the lead too unless you wanna possibly blind or hurt someone(i did this beforehand)
lines.text_raw: Remove the top and remove the lead too unless you wanna possibly blind or hurt someone(i did this beforehand)

lines.text: Push the bottom and cut the lead release guide
lines.text_raw: Push the bottom and cut the lead release guide

lines.text: Take out the coore you cut out
lines.text_raw: Take out the coore you cut out

lines.text: Trim the rest of that assembly on the removed core
